name: Ahri
description:
POP/STAR
Active | Mana: 0/30
Blow a kiss at the current target. It deals magic damage and briefly Stuns them. If the target has been kissed before, deals empowered magic damage instead. Headliner Effect: +25% Ability Power
Damage: 275% / 410% / 820% AP Empowered Damage: 480% / 720% / 1440% AP

name: Akali (K/DA)
description:
The Baddest
Active | Mana: 10/50
Throw a shuriken at the farthest unmarked target, marking them. Dash to every marked enemy, striking them for physical damage and dealing physical damage to enemies dashed through. Headliner Effect: +100 Health, +10% Attack Speed
Strike Damage: 190% / 190% / 380% AD Dash Damage: 80% / 120% / 400% AP

name: Akali (True Damage)
description:
Three Point Strike
Active | Mana: 0/60
Deal physical damage three times split between the three closest enemies whiin three hexes. For each enemy that survives all three waves, refund mana. Bling Bonus: Heal for 20% of the damage dealt with Three Point Strike. Headliner Effect: +100 Health, +10% Attack Speed
Damage Per Wave: 275% / 275% / 550% AD Mana Refund: 12% / 12% / 20% AP

name: Amumu
description:
Tantrum
Active | Mana: 0/45
Passive: When attacked, gain 4 Armor (stacks up to 25 times). Active: Deal magic damage to adjacent enemies. Every 3rd cast hits enemies within 2 hexes and Stuns them for 1.5 second. Headliner Effect: +150 Health, When attacked, also gains Magic Resist.
Damage: 80% / 120% / 190% AP Total Damage: Damage + 150% / 175% / 200% Armor

name: Annie
description:
Disintegrate
Active | Mana: 0/50
Passive: After 4 casts, gain 40% Attack Speed and cast deal magic damage to another nearby enemy. Active: Deal magic damage to the current target. Headliner Effect: +20 AP
Damage: 220% / 330% / 495% AP Additional Cast Damage: 80% / 120% / 180% AP

name: Aphelios
description:
Moonlight Lullaby
Active | Mana: 40/110
Deal physical damage and Stun the current target for a few seconds. Deal physical damage to enemies within 1 hex. If the original target dies, Stun enemies within 1 hex for 1 second. Headliner Effect: +25% AD
Stun Duration: 1.5 / 1.5 / 2 Damage: 725% AD Percent Damage: 10% AP Nearby Enemy Damage: Percent Damage of Damage

name: Bard
description:
Improv
Active | Mana: 15/60
Play a 4-note tune at random using 3 possible nots: Doot - Deal magic damage to the current target. Chime - Heal the lowest Health ally. Tip - Drop 1 gold and play another note. (3 Gold in Hyper Roll) Headliner Effect: The finale of Bard's plays cast each combat spreads an additional Doot for every 8 times he's cast this game. Doots deal 85 magic damage.
Doot: 200% / 300% / 450% AP Chime: 120% / 150% / 180% AP Tip Chance: 1% / 1% / 3% Headliner Doot Damage: 85 / 125 / 190

name: Blitzcrank
description:
Boogie Barrier
Active | Mana: 50/110
Passive: Deal magic damage to a nearby enemy every 2 seconds. Active: Gain a Shield. For 5 seconds, Blitzcrank's Passive deals damage every second and deals an additional 1% of target's max Health as magic damage. Headliner Effect: +200 Health, and the Passive always deals the max Health magic damage.
Zap Damage: 100% / 150% / 1000% AP Shield: 600% / 750% / 2000% AP

name: Caitlyn
description:
Champ Hunt
Active | Mana: 0/75
Fire shots at the 4 furthest enemies. Shots deal physical damage to the first enemy hit. Headliner Effect: +5% AD, and fire additional shot that deals 60% damage.
Attack Damage Ratio: 360% / 360% / 750% AD Ability Power Ratio: 40% / 60% / 200% AP Damage: AD + AP

name: Corki
description:
Blown to 8 Bits
Active | Mana: 15/60
Deal physical damage to the current target and adjacent enemies, then Wound them for a few seconds. Wound: Reduce healing received by 33% Headliner Effect: +20% AD
Damage: 320% AD Duration: 5% AP

description:
Record Scratch
Active | Mana: 50/125
Deal magic damage to enemies within 2 hexes and Stun them for 1 seconds. Gain a Health shield for 4 seconds. Bling Bonus: While the Shield is up, heal 100 Health every second. Headliner Effect: +200 Health, +20% Ability Power

name: Evelynn
description:
Whiplash
Active | Mana: 30/75

description:
Crash the Party
Active | Mana: 0/45
Blink away from the current target and deal physical damage to them. Every 3rd cast, deal physical damage to all enemies in a line. Headliner Effect: +15% AD

description:
Power-Up!
Active | Mana: 40/80
Gain max Health. Garen's next attack deals physical damage. Headliner Effect: +350 Health

Active | Mana: 40/80

name: Illaoi

Active | Mana: 70/150

Leaps at the nearest enemy and deal magic damage in a large circle 3 times as tentacles slam in unison. name: Jax
description:

Active | Mana: 50/120
Leap at the highest Health enemy within 2 hexes and deal magic damage to them. Then, deal magic damage to all adjacent enemies. Gain 10% Attack Damage and Ability Power for the rest of combat. Headliner Effect: +200 Health, +20% AP

name: Jhin
description:
Concerto to Demise in D Minor
Active | Mana: 30/50
Passive: Attacks generate 10 additional Mana. If your bench has 4 Grand Finale Rifles, begin conducting instead of attacking. Each Rifle fires at the same rate as the Maestro and deals physical damage. Every 4th volley deals 200% damage. Active: Put 1 Grand Finale Rifle into one of your empty bench slots. Headliner Effect: +10% Attack Damage, Combat Start: Put 1 Grand Finale Rifle onto an empty bench slot.
Rifles Per Cast: 1 / 1 / 4 Damage AP: 15% / 25% / 144% Damage AD: 66% / 66% / 444% Damage: Damage AD + Damage AP

name: Jinx
description:
Escalation
Active | Mana: 0/50

name: K'Sante
description:

name: Kai'Sa

Active | Mana: 15/105

description:

Active | Mana: 0/60

Active | Mana: 0/120

Active | Mana: 0/40

name: Kennen
description:

Active | Mana: 30/90

name: Lucian

Active | Mana: 50/125

If Arpeggio ends early, gain Mana based on the number of unused shots. Headliner Effect: +5% AD, Arepeggio fires an additional 3 shots.

Active | Mana: 0/40

When Face-Melter kills and enemy, gain 4% Ability Power and Attack Damage, and 4 Armor and Magic Resist. name: Nami

name: Olaf

Berserker Rage
Passive | Mana: No cost

Bling Bonus: After Sample & Remix kills a champion and copies an item, create 1 permanent component(s). name: Riven

Active | Mana: 0/60

THE PUNCHLINE
Active | Mana: 30/90

name: Sona
description:
The Drop
Active | Mana: 0/170
Kinetic Passive: Attacks instead send a beat to an ally, healing them for % of their maximum Health. Active: Send a beat to all allies and grant them a Shield for a few seconds. Headliner Effect: +5% AS, Gains 1% Attack Speed every time she attacks. Ethereal Passive: Attacks instead send a beat to an ally, granting them Attack Speed for 4 seconds. Active: Grant all allies Attack Speed and magic damage on attack for 6 seconds. Concussive Passive: Attacks instead send a beat to an ally, granting both Sona and the ally Ability Power. Active: Deal magic damage to the nearest enemies. Headliner Effect: +5% AS, Gains 2% Attack Speed every time she attacks.
[Kinetic] % Max Health: 6% / 9% / 100% [Kinetic] Shield: 350% / 550% / 3333% AP [Kinetic] Duration: 2.5 / 2.5 / 30 [Ethereal] Passive Attack Speed: 20% / 30% / 500% [Ethereal] Active Attack Speed: 100% / 150% / 777% [Ethereal] Damage Per Attack: 75% / 115% / 777% AP [Concussive] Ability Power: 3 / 4 / 100 [Concussive] Damage: 450% / 675% / 7777% [Concussive] Number of Targets: 5 / 5 / 11

Active | Mana: 0/70

name: Yorick
description:
GET IN THIS PIT! (ft. Ghouls)
